name: Tennis 2d Alpha
description:
*Known Bugs*

*Score is inconsistent between each turn.*

*ps4 controller may not work on windows*

*Some slowdown on windows with some users*

*AI sometimes refuses to return service*

Enjoy this endless game of tennis demo.

Restart the game with R to enjoy from 3 different courts, which change the speed and bounce of the ball. 

This game is not finished and still under development, feedback is very much appreciated. I cannot guarantee that the windows version works well or at all as I am developing on mac and testing on a very old/slow windows laptop.

--------Gamepad--------

Start to play.

R1 to hit ball

Left Analog to move

Right Analog to aim shot

---------Keyboard---------

Enter to play

J to hit ball

WSAD to move and to aim while taking shot

R to restart
